data.name: White Ditsy Floral Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase
data.description:
Experience the Beauty and Comfort of White Ditsy Floral Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase

Bring the beauty of nature into your sewing projects with Quilter's Showcase Fabric-Ditsy Floral on White. This fabric features delicate white flowers, some single stems and others in clusters, that cover the entirety of the fabric. Made from 100% cotton, this fabric is soft and light, making it perfect for an array of quilting projects. Whether you're making a summery quilt or craft, this fabric will add a touch of floral beauty and comfort to your creations.

Indulge in the feel of this cotton fabric, which is sure to impress with its intricate design and soft texture. You'll love how easy it is to care for, too. Simply machine wash it normally, separately, in cold water, and tumble dry it on low. You can also cool iron it if needed. Imported and featuring a ditsy floral theme, this fabric is a must-have for any sewing enthusiast.

Product Details

data.name: Navy & Green Stripes Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase
data.description:
Upgrade Your Quilting Game with Navy & Green Stripes Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase

Transform your quilting projects with the Navy & Green Stripes Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase. This fabric is made from 100% cotton, ensuring durability and comfort. The stunning navy and green stripes design adds a touch of sophistication to any quilt, making it the perfect addition to your fabric collection.

With a width of 43 inches, this fabric is perfect for a variety of quilting projects. It's easy to care for too - simply machine wash gentle cold, use nonchlorine bleach, tumble dry low, and warm iron. Plus, it's imported, so you know you're getting a product of the highest quality.

Product Details

  • Width: 43 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine wash gentle cold, nonchlorine bleach, tumble dry low, warm iron
  • Imported

data.name: Dots on Navy Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase
data.description:
Get Creative with Dots on Navy Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase

Looking for a versatile fabric that can be used in a variety of quilting projects? Look no further than Dots on Navy Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase. With its classic navy background and playful polka dot pattern, this fabric is perfect for adding a pop of color and personality to any quilt. Whether you're a seasoned quilter or just starting out, this fabric is a must-have for your collection.

Not only is this fabric stylish, it's also practical. Made from 100% cotton, it's soft and comfortable to work with, and it's easy to care for. Simply machine wash gentle cold, use nonchlorine bleach if needed, tumble dry low, and warm iron if necessary. This imported fabric is sure to become a staple in your quilting supplies.

Product Details

  • Width: 43 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine Wash Gentle Cold, Nonchlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, War

data.name: Black Sketched Sunflowers Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase
data.description:
Bring the Beauty of Nature into Your Home with Black Sketched Sunflowers Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase

Transform your living space into a comfy haven with the Black Sketched Sunflowers Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase. The intricate sketched sunflower design on this fabric will add a touch of elegance to any room. Made with 100% cotton, this fabric is not only soft to the touch but also durable, ensuring it will last for years to come.

Whether you're creating a beautiful quilt or adding some flair to your home decor, the Black Sketched Sunflowers Quilt Cotton Fabric by Quilter's Showcase is the perfect choice. The fabric is machine washable, making it easy to maintain its beauty and keep it looking fresh and new.

Product Details

  • Width: 43 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine wash gentle cold, non-chlorine bleach, tumble dry low, warm iron
  • Imported
  • Used For: Quilts, Crafts, Pet Acces
